General.Name: Dogus Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Dogus Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. ("Company") has been incorporated in accordance with capital market law on 25 July 1997. Dogus Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.'s (the "Company") which is traded on the Borsa Istanbul, main activity is to invest in properties, create, manage, make the necessary changes in the portfolio, minimize the risk of variation in real estate; property related capital market instruments, invest and monitor continuously the real estate based projects and take the necessary measures to protect, also research to increase the value of the portfolio. The headquarter of the Company is registered in Dogus Center Maslak, Maslak Mahallesi, Ahi Evran Cad. No: 4/7 Maslak, Sariyer-Istanbul.

1.Name: Ms. Nazli  Yilmaz
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. of Financial Affairs & Investor Relations Department Personnel
